item.title: Constant overflowing bins outside Sainsbury’s local and flats, 23rd December
item.description:
The bin outside the Sainsbury’s local and nearby flats are constantly overflowing and leaving rubbish all around this area. This is constant and making the surrounding areas and streets dirty and a complete eyesore. Nothing is ever done about the litter. The photos attached are on a relatively good state compared to how it is some days. Greenwich council seems intent on leaving its residents to live on litter-filled streets that resemble those of a third world country trying to with no waste management services.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Banning Street, Greenwich
Report on FixMyStreet
